{"id":854578608,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1670174644,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/854578608/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        if (numRows == 1) {\n            return s;\n        }\n\n        string answer;\n        int n = s.size();\n        int charsInSection = 2 * (numRows - 1);\n\n        for (int currRow = 0; currRow < numRows; ++currRow) {\n            int index = currRow;\n\n            while (index < n) {\n                answer += s[index];\n\n                // If currRow is not the first or last row\n                // then we have to add one more character of current section.\n                if (currRow != 0 && currRow != numRows - 1) {\n                    int charsInBetween = charsInSection - 2 * currRow;\n                    int secondIndex = index + charsInBetween;\n                    \n                    if (secondIndex < n) {\n                        answer += s[secondIndex];\n                    }\n                }\n                // Jump to same row's first character of next section.\n                index += charsInSection;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return answer;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false}
